meanings.definition: To sell more than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The new toy is outselling all the other toys in the store.
meanings.sent2: The popular brand is outselling its competitors in the market.
meanings.sent3: The little lemonade stand was outselling the big soda company!
meanings.sent4: Her charm was outselling any sales strategy they had.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh bread was outselling all other scents in the bakery.

meanings.definition: To be more successful in sales than others.
meanings.sent1: Their online store is outselling all the brick-and-mortar shops.
meanings.sent2: The local bakery is outselling the chain bakeries in town.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bookstore was outselling the giant book chain!
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm was outselling any marketing campaign.
meanings.sent5: The colorful display was outselling all the other products on the shelf.
